content.rendered:
Wrangler National Finals Rodeo is scheduled for December 7-16, 2023 at Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas. The WNFR presented by Polaris RANGER® is the season-ending championship event for the Professional Rodeo Cowboys Association (PRCA) and is widely recognized to be the world’s premier rodeo.

Watch NFR 2023 Live Online - SUBSCRIBE HERE

NFR 2023 Streaming info
Streaming
The Cowboy Channel (real-time) Watch Here
RFD-TV (real-time) Watch Here
Cowboy Channel Plus (International) Watch Here

 

NFR 2023 Performance

The Cowboy Channel will air the NFR live, nightly starting at 5:45 p.m. PST/8:45 p.m. EST from Thomas & Mack Center in Las Vegas. The live NFR simulcast on both The Cowboy Channel and RFD-TV for 10 straight nights. Here look at the programming schedule and where you can watch your favorite shows every day of the NFR 2023.

NFR Schedule
Date Performance Time TV Channel
Thursday, Dec. 7 Performance 1 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Friday, Dec. 8 Performance 2 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Saturday, Dec. 9 Performance 3 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Sunday, Dec. 10 Performance 4 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Monday, Dec. 11 Performance 5 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Tuesday, Dec. 12 Performance 6 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Wednesday, Dec. 13 Performance 7 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Thursday, Dec. 14 Performance 8 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Friday, Dec. 15 Performance 9 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel
Saturday, Dec. 16 Performance10 8:45 p.m. — 11:30 p.m. ET The Cowboy Channel

Special Presentation Nights

  • Thursday, December 7th – Pendleton Whisky Night
  • Friday, December 8th- COORS Night, Purina Vet of The Year
  • Saturday, December 9th – Hesston By Massey Ferguson Night
  • Sunday, December 10th- Polaris Ranger Night, Memorial Night
  • Monday, December 11th – Tough Enough To Wear Pink Night
  • Tuesday, December 12th – Resistol Rookie Night
  • Wednesday, December 13th – Tarleton State Night
  • Thursday, December 14th – Justin Boots Night, Canadian Night
  • Friday, December 15th – Ram Rodeo Night
  • Saturday, December 16th – Wrangler National Patiot Night

Don’t forget to bookmark our website. For more information on the Wrangler NFR, please visit NFRexperience. For the latest RODEO news and NFR coverage, please visit fd-uat-autopayroll-app.apps.dfes.wa.gov.au or through social media at /LasVegasNFR and use #WranglerNFR
